original_text: People will come here from everywhere in Judah. They will bring offerings to the Lord's temple. They will come from Judah's towns and from the villages around Jerusalem. They will come from the land that belongs to Benjamin's tribe. They will come from the low hills in the west and from the hill country and the wilderness in the south. They will bring burnt offerings, grain offerings, other sacrifices and incense. They will offer sacrifices to the Lord to thank him. People will come here from everywhere in Judah. They will bring offerings to the Lord's temple. They will come from Judah's towns and from the villages around Jerusalem. They will come from the land that belongs to Benjamin's tribe. They will come from the low hills in the west and from the hill country and the wilderness in the south. They will bring burnt offerings, grain offerings, other sacrifices and incense. They will offer sacrifices to the Lord to thank him.
korean_text: 사람들이 유다 성읍들과 예루살렘에 둘린 곳들과 베냐민 땅과 평지와 산지와 네겝으로부터 와서 번제와 희생과 소제와 유향과 감사제물을 여호와의 성전에 가져오려니와

sentences.original_text: They will come from Judah's towns
and from the villages around Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 예루살렘 주변의 마을들에서도 올 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will come from the land that belongs to Benjamin's tribe
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 베냐민 지파의 땅에서 올 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will come from the low hills in the west
and the wilderness in the south
They will offer sacrifices to the Lord
